blogs.title: Introducing Mr. Chowdhury
blogs.body: Hello, I am a passionate engineer. I build many kinds of software and hardware-based projects where I try to simulate my own ideas. I love to learn new things. I love to study astronomy and astrophysics as well. Tesla car gives me new hope and inspiration to gain more knowledge. I like to save quotes from famous scientists, actors and entrauprauners, movies as well! I plan to tour many countries, Spain is the dream one! "Life is a journey and why do we chase it?"
blogs.author: Ibrahim Chowdhury Sakib
